net.proteusframework.users.prefs

Class HPreferencesSessionAcceptor

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.HibernateSessionHelper
      • net.proteusframework.users.prefs.HPreferencesSessionAcceptor
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.HibernateSessionAcceptor

    @HibernateSessionAcceptorConfig(value="hpreferencesSessionAcceptor",
                                sessionLifeCycleListenerClasses=com.i2rd.users.UsersUtilSessionLifeCycleListener.class)
public class HPreferencesSessionAcceptor
extends net.proteusframework.core.hibernate.HibernateSessionHelper
    Manages the persistence for Hibernate Preferences.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com), Ken Logan (ken@i2rd.com)

      • evictAllUserPreferenceDataFromL1

        public void evictAllUserPreferenceDataFromL1(Principal p)
        Evicts all the preferences data from the L1. This is only necessary when the L1 is a LongSession.
        Parameters:
        p - the principal to evict for.

      • flushAllPreferences

        public void flushAllPreferences()
        Flush all preferences. This is automatically called prior to closing the sessions.

      • flushPreferences

        public void flushPreferences(HPreferences prefs)
        Flush this node to the database
        Parameters:
        prefs - the preferences to store

      • getChildrenNames

        public String[] getChildrenNames(boolean userPref,
                        String absolutePath)
        Get the names of children nodes
        Parameters:
        userPref - true if this is for user preferences
        absolutePath - the node path
        Returns:
        the names of any existing child nodes

      • removePreferences

        public void removePreferences(HPreferences prefs)
        Remove a preferences node.
        Parameters:
        prefs - the node to remove
